sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/livingroom-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams, useparams} from 'react-router-dom' import livingroomData from '../assets/data/livingrooms' const LivingroomDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const livingroom = livingroomData.find(livingroom=>livingroom.id===id) const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews} = livingroom return ( <>

{title}

{ calculateAvgRating===0?null:avgRating } { totalRating===0?("Not rated"): ( ({reviews.length}) ) }
) } export default LivingroomDetails;
